name: Todo: trigger für Webseite, Download freizugeben
Read specific id from connections table
Create Table IF NOT EXISTS
template: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {{topic}}(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,timehr TEXT, timeunix INTEGER, value REAL);

name: update lastmsgtime
template: update connections set lastmsgtime = {{timeunix}} where refid = {{clientinfo.refid}};

name: change DisplayName
template: update connections set dispname = '{{dispName}}' where refid = {{deviceId}};

func:
msg.deviceId=msg.payload.deviceId;
msg.dispName=msg.payload.dispName
msg.isVisible=msg.payload.isVisible
msg.shownDataPoints=msg.payload.shownDataPoints
msg.interval=msg.payload.interval
return msg

name: change Visibility
template: update connections set isvisible = '{{isVisible}}' where refid = {{deviceId}};

name: change curinterval
template: update connections set curinterval = '{{interval}}' where refid = {{deviceId}};

name: change shownDataPoints
template: update connections set showndatapoints = '{{shownDataPoints}}' where refid = {{deviceId}};

name: DASHBOARD Autosending on page load
info:
ctrl messages from uibuilder node are analysed.

If page is (re)loading, the flow downwards is triggered.

See here:
https://github.com/TotallyInformation/node-red-contrib-uibuilder/wiki/How-to-send-data-when-a-client-connects-or-reloads-the-page

name: sort layout data
forEach send select showndatapoints where refId matching
include shownDataPoints in dashboardData
forEach send select datapoints
include DataPoints in dashboardData
sort group data
sort overviewData
sort settingsInputData, forEach send lastmsgtime
attach formatted lastmsgtime

name: select * from uilayout
template: select * from uilayout where htmlid in ('val-{{payload}}-{{clientinfo.refid}}','chart-{{payload}}-{{clientinfo.refid}}') ;

name: calc itemCount to add to dashboard
insert new group into uigroups
select highest htmlid from uigroups
template: select * from uigroups order by cast(htmlid as integer) desc limit 1;

name: insert new items into uilayout

send check if table exists
